column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " And then when I was nine , I ran away again . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Uh-huh . "
#Text=Toph says : " I know I should n't complain .
#Text=" Toph says : " This is the worst field trip ever .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Judging by the looks on your faces , I 'm guessing you guys did n't find Aang , either .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No .
#Text=It 's like he just ... disappeared .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey , wait a minute .
#Text=Has anyone noticed that Momo is missing , too ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh no !
#Text=I knew it was only a matter of time !
#Text=Appa ate Momo !
#Text=Momo , I 'm coming for you , buddy .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , Appa did n't eat Momo .
#Text=He 's probably with Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's just what Appa wants you to think .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Get out of the bison 's mouth , Sokka .
#Text=We have a real problem here .
#Text=Aang is nowhere to be found and the comet is only two days away .
#Text=" Katara says : " What should we do Zuko ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Why are you all looking at me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , you are kind of the expert on tracking Aang .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , if anyone 's got experience hunting the Avatar ... it 's you .
#Text="
